body: So, 2nd chapter is not there yet!
Thanks! One of the best mangakas - Ozaki Akira, his works are awesome.

very glad to see more ozaki being translated! he is one of the all time great erotic artists, for both style and story, and there is nothing else like ozaki. hopefully all of his work will be translated someday. looking forward to the continuation - i hope?
why start translation of volume 2 and skip volume 1 tho?

Yes 👍🏻 I like his works being translated I’m hoping someday he makes a full spin off story of the mother and the best friend becoming a secret couple there characters from https://nhentai.net/g/212373/ and a sequel where they have sex https://nhentai.net/g/229643/
Holy shit one of Ozaki's older works getting translated!? I can't believe my eyes!!!!!!!
